SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.game

Interface RemoteGameController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface RemoteGameController extends Remote
RemoteGameController interface provides methods to manage a remote game session. It allows clients to create and join games, draw resources, place cards, communicate through chat, and manage game observers. This interface extends the Remote interface for RMI communication.

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      void createGame(int numPlayers, String nickname, String ConnectionType) throws RemoteException, GameAlreadyCreatedException
      Creates a new game session.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players for the game.
      nickname - the nickname of the player creating the game.
      ConnectionType - the type of connection (e.g., RMI, Socket).
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      GameAlreadyCreatedException - if a game is already created.

      void drawResources(String player) throws RemoteException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(String player, String ConnectionType) throws FullLobbyException, NicknameAlreadyUsedException, RemoteException, GameNotExistingException
      Adds a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      ConnectionType - the type of connection (e.g., RMI, Socket).
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full.
      NicknameAlreadyUsedException - if the nickname is already used.
      GameNotExistingException - if the game does not exist.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(String player, int choice, int i, int j, String face) throws UnknownPlayerException, PlayerNotInTurnException, InvalidStateException, RemoteException, GameNotExistingException, CoordinatesOutOfBoundsException, NoCardsAvailableException, RequirementsNotMetException, ArgumentException
      Places a card on the board.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      choice - the card choice index.
      i - the row index on the board.
      j - the column index on the board.
      face - the face of the card.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      UnknownPlayerException - if the player is unknown.
      PlayerNotInTurnException - if the player is not in turn.
      InvalidStateException - if the game state is invalid.
      GameNotExistingException - if the game does not exist.
      CoordinatesOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are out of bounds.
      NoCardsAvailableException - if there are no cards available.
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the requirements are not met.
      ArgumentException - if there is an argument error.

      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      choice - the objective card choice index.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • canPickColor

      void canPickColor(String nickname, String color) throws PlayerNotInTurnException, InvalidStateException, ColorAlreadyPickedException, RemoteException, GameNotExistingException, UnknownPlayerException, IllegalArgumentException

      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player.
      color - the color chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      PlayerNotInTurnException - if the player is not in turn.

      ColorAlreadyPickedException - if the color is already picked.
      GameNotExistingException - if the game does not exist.
      UnknownPlayerException - if the player is unknown.
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an argument error.

    • canDrawTable

      void canDrawTable(String player, int choice) throws PlayerNotInTurnException, InvalidStateException, GameNotExistingException, RemoteException, NullCardSelectedException, UnknownPlayerException, IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if a player can draw a card from the table.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      choice - the card choice index.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      PlayerNotInTurnException - if the player is not in turn.
      InvalidStateException - if the game state is invalid.
      GameNotExistingException - if the game does not exist.
      NullCardSelectedException - if the selected card is null.
      UnknownPlayerException - if the player is unknown.
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an argument error.

    • canSendGroupChat

      void canSendGroupChat(String sender, String text) throws BadTextException, InvalidStateException, RemoteException, UnknownPlayerException, GameNotExistingException
      Checks if a player can send a group chat message.
      Parameters:
      sender - the nickname of the sender.
      text - the text message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      BadTextException - if the text is inappropriate.
      InvalidStateException - if the game state is invalid.
      UnknownPlayerException - if the sender is unknown.
      GameNotExistingException - if the game does not exist.

    • canSendPrivateChat

      void canSendPrivateChat(String sender, String receiver, String text) throws UnknownPlayerException, GameNotExistingException, PlayerAbsentException, BadTextException, InvalidStateException, ParametersException, RemoteException
      Checks if a player can send a private chat message.
      Parameters:
      sender - the nickname of the sender.
      receiver - the nickname of the receiver.
      text - the text message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      UnknownPlayerException - if the sender or receiver is unknown.
      GameNotExistingException - if the game does not exist.
      PlayerAbsentException - if the receiver is absent.
      BadTextException - if the text is inappropriate.
      InvalidStateException - if the game state is invalid.
      ParametersException - if there is a parameter error.

    • rejoinGame

      void rejoinGame(String nickname, String ConnectionType) throws RemoteException, InvalidStateException, GameNotExistingException, UnknownPlayerException
      Allows a player to rejoin the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player.
      ConnectionType - the type of connection (e.g., RMI, Socket).
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      InvalidStateException - if the game state is invalid.
      GameNotExistingException - if the game does not exist.
      UnknownPlayerException - if the player is unknown.
